Carl Maria ... was in declining health and short on cash when London covering a garden invited him to right over on an opera based on the supernatural tail of the ferry king
The ailing composer knew his days are numbered but he accepted the commission in order to provide for his family
He took a crash course in English and against doctor's orders traveled to London in February Eighteen twenty six the April from year was a triumph as vapor reported I have had such a complete success as perhaps never before
He conducted a dozen more performances before dying of tuberculosis two months later just before he was to return to Germany he was forty years old
